channel.title: PI Source Question
channel.description:
Ok, this is a PI source remember.
I need to know how to change spellbook teleports such as the home lummy teleport to my custom home on modern magics, etc
Can someone tell me how?

item.title: PI Source Question
item.dc:creator: @crazyfazespy crazyfazespy
item.description:
@crazyfazespy wrote:

src\server\model\players\packets
ClickingButtons class

[code=java] //home teleports
case 4171:
case 50056:
case 117048:
String type = c.playerMagicBook == 0 ? “modern” : “ancient”;
c.getPA().startTeleport(3398, 3570, 0, type);
break;

		case 50235:
		case 4140:

//fist teleport //like varocc, lubridge etc… also its for modern and ancients only.
break;

		case 4143:
		case 50245:

//2 teleport
break;

		case 50253:
		case 4146:

//3teleports
break;

		case 51005:
		case 4150:

//4teleport
break;

		case 51013:
		case 6004:

//5teleport
break;

		case 51023:
		case 6005:

//6tekeport
break;

		case 51031:
		case 29031:

//7teleport
break;
[/code]

It should look like

case 50235: case 4140: c.getPA().spellTeleport(3240, 3616, 0);

Read full topic
